TopicTitle: Found a new use for the Escape Tower

Articles.Content:
Parachute towers.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Land with your parachutes on the atmospheric body of your choice and then hit the button to get rid of them all.

Er...yeah, that's it.
I never thought of this,great for Eve return vehicles
Funny I just used this on Laythe. Worked perfectly.
Neat! This might come in handy should I do an Eve mission.

This is a handy trick

I thought about this before, but just to put the chutes somewhere they don't obstruct anything. Didn't think about jettisoning them, though.
This should work well for landing rockets too, when landing base parts!

Oh wow I never thought of that, that is smart! Looks a lot sleeker than the current methodes of detachable parachutes too (which I personally rate quite highly when designing craft). +1 my good sir/madam. +1 indeed.

Thanks. Although the escape tower is pretty cool I am unsure of its real use at the moment given that you can simply roll back the launch. Perhaps it is for a future contract system where you get penalised if Kerbals get killed?
Or simply for players who like their game especially realistic.
For people who play ironman mode and don't revert or load saves.
